## Description {#details}

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/instsimplifyfolder">InstSimplifyFolder</a> - <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a> InstructionSimplify to fold operations to existing values.

Also applies target-specific constant folding when not using InstructionSimplify.

Definition at line 35 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/analysis/instsimplifyfolder-h">InstSimplifyFolder.h</a>.
